name: CHI Residences 314

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at Chi is very friendly and helpful. The check in and check out process are seamless & the overall service during the stay was top notch. The room is kept clean and well stocked with items thanks to the maid staff. The doormen are all very friendly and quick to offer an umbrella if it looks like it might rain.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: The rooms are spacious & comfortable. The living room area is tastefully decorated with a state of the art television, air purifier & Wifi. There is a full size refrigerator and the kitchen is stocked with utensils for cooking on the stove top.
reviews.title: Comfortable and excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bedroom has ample closet space for clothes & luggage. The bathroom has a very nice shower and lots of shelf space for toiletries.
reviews.title: Best Value For Money

reviews.text: The location is ideal whether you are visiting Hong Kong for work or pleasure. The MTR is a short walk away, as are lots of restaurants and shops.
reviews.title: A little gem in the middle of Nathan Road

reviews.text: A+ all the way around for the CHI Residences.
reviews.title: An oasis from the busy city!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would say it is the most convenient place to stay in Hongkong because it is so close to everything. Transportation is just around the corner, restaurant are everywhere so with shopping mall. The room is exemplary, bed, pillows and duvets are heavenly comfortable. The staff are very knowledgeable,, helpful and friendly.Great place to stay, we love the luxurious place and it's cleanliness.The free internet is connected to the big TV screen is a plus....
reviews.title: The most convenient place

reviews.text: I stayed at CHI 314 upon the good reviews it received here and I must say its all true.
reviews.title: The reviews are true!

reviews.text: For that price, in this location, it is worth the money.
reviews.title: Place to stay in HK!

reviews.text: The room had everything I needed, was clean, stylish, spacious enough etc.
reviews.title: Awesome Place!

reviews.text: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Also borrowed some DVDs from them. They also took me to the room and showed me how everything works.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay!!!

reviews.text: The Chi Residences 314 tick every box, clean, comfortable, roomy, good location, and really friendly staff. We found the location very good for MTR, groceries, markets and all the sightseeing. The price is reasonable, and we had a fantastic stay in Hong Kong, because of the comfortable clean apartment. A special shout out to Francis, who we all took a liking to, he is so friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: The best place to stay in Honk Kong

reviews.text: I have just come back from a 1 month stay at the Chi 314 i have to say i felt very looked after the staff are great and very helpfull big thanks to Tony & francis also cleaning staff who keep the room spotless.
reviews.title: A very good Stay

reviews.text: The room its self was very nice comfortable with Tv in the living room and bedroom,
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay in the middle of Hong Kong.
Convenient location, nice place
reviews.text: If i could of taken the bed back home with mei would of it was so comfortable
Overall a really good stay with no negatives to report
reviews.title: Fantastic value for money!
I loved the facilities and the comfort of the CHI Residence
reviews.text: This is my second stay at the CHI 314 and I really appreciated the two experiences. The apartments are causy, well design and well equipped. The welcome of the staff is excellent and professional. The easy connection to the Jordan MTR station is really convenient to reach any places quickly.
I strongly recommend to choice CHI Residences..
reviews.title: Just perfect

reviews.text: Gerard Saliot
reviews.title: 3 months at CHI

reviews.text: I've never had a better night's sleep in Hong Kong! Chi is only a hop skip and jump away from both Jordan MTR and the hustle and bustle of central TST, but is also sufficiently far away for you to enjoy a quiet night of sleep. The apartments themselves are spacious by Hong Kong standards, immaculately presented and generously furnished, and the rates extremely reasonable. I mustn't forget the staff, who were very helpful and courteous throughout my stay. A little gem!!
reviews.title: A fantastic place to stay at!

reviews.text: As is not unusual in Hong Kong, rooms are relatively small. However, CHI Residences comprise newly refurbished rooms with modern furnishings and are well equipped including TV’s, free Wi-Fi, coffee and tea making facilities, cooker, etc. Daily maid service for free and laundry service available but expensive.
reviews.title: Spacious, modern, and clean...in a great location...would definitely return.

description: CHI 314 by CHI Residences is located in the heart of Kowloon on Hong Kong’s famous Golden Mile. The 57 apartments range from 410 to 1,400 square feet, with options for every budget and space requirement. Apartments are not only stylish, but totally comfortable, liveable, functional spaces. Neighbourhood attractions include Austin Road, Canton Road with Hong Kong’s top fashion shops and malls, and some of Hong Kong’s best local restaurants.
